name: Flinders Backpackers Melbourne
description:
Winner of the Hostelworld's HOSCARs Award in 2017, 2018, 2019 & 2020 for Most popular hostel in Melbourne. 

This is the perfect place for every traveller. We have a welcoming atmosphere and multiple facilities at our guest's disposal.  

We are located directly in the heart of the city. Not only are we surrounded by activities for guests to partake in, such as shopping, adventuring or indulging in some delicious treats from the cafes in Melbourne. Flinders Backpackers is also located just a few minutes from Flinders Street Station, South Bank and Federation Square. 

At Flinders Backpackers there are an abundance of facilities for our guests to use. A large common/dining area with a welcoming atmosphere for guests to socialize in & maybe partake in a game of pool or head up to the rooftop cafe for a view of the city skyline.  
A large communal kitchen for guests to pursue their culinary passions or maybe even to cook up a small meal, we got it all. As well as a walk-in refrigerator & dry shelves for guests to store their ingredients. 

Each room has individual bedside lights, shelfs & USB power plugs so guests can charge their devices. As well as having lockers available in all the dorm rooms for guests to store their belongings during their stay. 

Flinders Reception staff are always available 24/7 to help with any guest questions and to give some recommendations of fun things to do around Melbourne. 
Free unlimited Wi-Fi is available in all rooms and the common area. 
Laundry facilities are also available. 

Does Flinders Backpackers sound like the best place to stay? Book in now & explore the joys of the CBD and indulge in the facilities available.

Please take the time to read through our  below before booking.

houseRules.notes:
CHECK IN REQUIREMENTS & RESERVATIONS CONDITIONS: 

-All guests must have a VALID driver's licence or passport, a credit card and $20 security deposit at time of check in. If you do not have these your booking will be cancelled and you will not be checked in. 

-All guests must be 18 years or older. Even if accompanied by an adult.

-All our dorm beds are reserved for travellers aged between 18 - 35 years only. Guests over 35 years are welcome to book private rooms only.

-At check-in guests will be required to sign a health declaration. -Check In time is after 2pm on the day of arrival. 

-Payment can be accepted by cash, VISA, Mastercard. American Express is not accepted. 

-Booking modifications and cancellations are accepted up to the day before arrival via the link on the reservation confirmation email. -No refunds are given for early checkouts. 

OTHER IMPORTANT INFORMATION: 

-Flinders Backpackers is in the heart of the busy CBD. As such, guests may be disturbed by noise due to trams, traffic, and people on the busy streets surrounding the hostel as well as the noise from the bar and basement nightclub in the building, particularly on Friday and Saturday nights. If you are a light sleeper, please seek alternative accommodation. 

-The hostel is not always able to accommodate groups of 2 or more guests together in the same dorm rooms due to available beds may be in different rooms. 

-The 14, 16 and 18 Bed Dorms do not have bathroom on the same level as the rooms. 

-The hostel has strict no alcohol hours between 10pm and 12noon. No drinking or storage of alcohol is allowed in the rooms. -Smoking in the premises is totally prohibited. This includes e-cigarettes. -Flinders Backpackers has the right to refuse stay at the time of check in, if the check in requirements is not met, and/or if any person has caused problems at the property or another property in the past.
